com.fortyoneconcepts.valjogen.processor

Class STTemplates

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortyoneconcepts.valjogen.processor.STTemplates

  • public final class STTemplates
extends Object
    Loads and holds STGroup file(s) according to configuration and offer inspection methods about the content. template.
